archimate:BusinessObject.name: DropProbabilityDetails
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
This aggregation is used to define different drop probabilities for each CoS. For example, a different drop probability can be used for individual or group ToS and DSCP values.
If this instance is a simple RED instance, then there will only be a single REDServiceElement. If this instance is a WRED instance, then there will be a set of REDServiceElements, one for each type of traffic that is treated differently.
